mapper.select: SELECT A.WORKER_ID, A.IN_TIME, A.OUT_TIME, A.IS_LATE, A.IS_ABSENCE, I.WORKER_NAME, W.GOING_TIME, W.QUITTING_TIME, A.ATT_DT ,I.POSITION_CD, I.USERTYPE, I.STARTDAY, I.ALLPAY FROM STAFF_ATTENDANCE A INNER JOIN STAFF_INFORMATION I ON A.WORKER_ID = I.WORKER_ID INNER JOIN WORKSHEET W ON I.WORKER_ID = W.WORKER_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd hh24:mi') BETWEEN A.IN_TIME AND TO_CHAR(W.QUITTING_TIME, 'yy-MM-dd hh24:mi') AND TO_DATE(A.ATT_DT, 'yy-MM-dd') = TO_DATE(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd') and to_char(w.going_time, 'yy-MM-dd') = a.att_dt
select * from worksheet where to_char(current_date, 'hh24:mi') between to_char(going_time, 'hh24:mi') and to_char(quitting_time, 'hh24:mi') and work_dt = to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd')
mapper.insert: Insert into staff_attendance(att_id, worker_id, att_dt, in_time, is_late, is_absence) VALUES(SEQ_ATTENDANCE.nextval, #{workerId}, to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd'), to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd hh24:mi'), 0, 0)
mapper.select: select w.worker_id, s.att_dt, w.going_time, quitting_time, s.in_time, s.out_time from worksheet w, staff_attendance s where w.worker_id = s.worker_id and s.att_Dt = to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd') and to_char(w.going_time, 'yy-MM-dd') = s.att_dt and w.worker_id = #{workerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE STAFF_ATTENDANCE SET IS_LATE = 1 WHERE WORKER_ID = #{workerId} AND ATT_DT = TO_CHAR(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd') AND ATT_DT = (SELECT TO_CHAR(GOING_TIME, 'yy-MM-dd') FROM WORKSHEET WHERE WORKER_ID = #{workerId} AND TO_CHAR(GOING_TIME, 'yy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd'))

UPDATE STAFF_ATTENDANCE SET IS_ABSENCE = 1 WHERE WORKER_ID = #{workerId} AND ATT_DT = TO_CHAR(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd') AND ATT_DT = (SELECT TO_CHAR(GOING_TIME, 'yy-MM-dd') FROM WORKSHEET WHERE WORKER_ID = #{workerId} AND TO_CHAR(GOING_TIME, 'yy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd'))
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND((TO_DATE(s.in_time, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') - w.quitting_time) * 24 * 60 * 60, 2) AS getTime FROM staff_attendance s, worksheet w where s.worker_id = w.worker_id and s.worker_id = #{workerId} and s.att_Dt = to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd') and to_char(w.going_time, 'yy-MM-dd') = s.att_dt
mapper.update: UPDATE staff_attendance SET out_time = to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd hh24:mi') WHERE worker_id = #{workerId} and att_Dt = to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd') and att_dt = (select to_char(going_time, 'yy-MM-dd') from worksheet where worker_id = #{workerId} and to_char(going_time, 'yy-MM-dd') = to_char(current_date, 'yy-MM-dd'))
mapper.select: SELECT W.WORKER_ID, S.ATT_DT, W.GOING_TIME, QUITTING_TIME, TO_DATE(S.IN_TIME, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS inMTime, S.OUT_TIME, ROUND(((current_date - TO_DATE(S.IN_TIME, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) *24)/((QUITTING_TIME - GOING_TIME) *24),2) * 100 AS percent, ROUND((W.QUITTING_TIME - current_date) * 24 * 60 * 60, 2) AS getMTime FROM WORKSHEET W, STAFF_ATTENDANCE S WHERE W.WORKER_ID = S.WORKER_ID AND S.ATT_DT = TO_CHAR(current_date, 'YY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(W.GOING_TIME, 'YY-MM-DD') = S.ATT_DT AND W.WORKER_ID = #{workerId}

SELECT * FROM staff_attendance WHERE to_date(att_dt, 'yy-MM-dd') IN(trunc(current_date,'d'), trunc(current_date,'d')+1, trunc(current_date,'d')+2, trunc(current_date,'d')+3, trunc(current_date,'d')+4, trunc(current_date,'d')+5, trunc(current_date,'d')+6) ORDER BY ATT_DT

SELECT NVL(SUM(IS_LATE), 0) AS IS_LATE FROM STAFF_ATTENDANCE WHERE ATT_DT IN(TRUNC(current_date,'D'), TRUNC(current_date,'D')+1, TRUNC(current_date,'D')+2, TRUNC(current_date,'D')+3, TRUNC(current_date,'D')+4, TRUNC(current_date,'D')+5, TRUNC(current_date,'D')+6) AND WORKER_ID = #{workerId}
SELECT NVL(SUM(IS_LATE), 0) AS IS_LATE FROM STAFF_ATTENDANCE WHERE SUBSTR(ATT_DT,0,8) BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(current_date,'MM'),'YYYYMMDD') ) AND (LAST_DAY(current_date)) AND WORKER_ID = #{workerId}
